name: gfs-visual-learning
description: Interactive visual learning system for Google File System

scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run copy-data
scripts.bundle: echo '// GFS Visual Learning System - Bundled Application' > docs/app.js && for file in src/utils/sanitizer.js src/core/app-state.js src/core/composer.js src/core/renderer.js src/core/validator.js src/learning/*.js src/ui/*.js; do echo '' >> docs/app.js && echo "// === $file ===" >> docs/app.js && cat "$file" >> docs/app.js && echo '' >> docs/app.js; done
scripts.copy-data: cp -r data/specs docs/data/ && cp data/manifest.json docs/data/ && cp data/schema.json docs/data/
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:validate && npm run test:smoke && npm run test:errors
